div.h2: Backported R5 Subscription Content Code System

div.p: Codes to represent how much resource content to send in the notification payload.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/subscriptions-backport/CodeSystem/backport-content-code-system defines the following codes:

tr.td: No resource content is transacted in the notification payload.
Only the resource id is transacted in the notification payload.
The entire resource is transacted in the notification payload.

title.value: Backported R5 Subscription Content Code System

description.value: Codes to represent how much resource content to send in the notification payload.

definition.value: No resource content is transacted in the notification payload.
Only the resource id is transacted in the notification payload.
The entire resource is transacted in the notification payload.
